# bq-tab

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description             | Type                  | Default   |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------- | --------------------- | --------- |
| `active`   | `active`   | If true tab is active   | `boolean`             | `false`   |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | If true tab is disabled | `boolean`             | `false`   |
| `size`     | `size`     | The size of the tab     | `"medium" \| "small"` | `'small'` |
